definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: The Allosaurus was a meat eater.
Recent history has witnessed the exciting politicization of meat.
sentences.chinese: 近代歷史見證了肉食品的政治化。

sentences.english: Less the amount of meat, mainly to satisfy their craving.
sentences.chinese: 肉食的量要少，以解饞爲主。

sentences.english: I mean that someday the population of vegetarian will more than the meat-eaters?
sentences.chinese: 我是說有沒有可能未來素食的人口會多於肉食者呢？

sentences.english: Tyson Foods was charged with smuggling illegal immigrants to work in meat packing plants.
sentences.chinese: 泰森食品公司被指控偷運非法移民在肉食包裝廠打工。

sentences.english: The type of dinosaur that was found is known as a theropod.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種獸腳亞目肉食恐龍。

sentences.english: When threatened by a predator, hissing cockroaches make loud hisses .
sentences.chinese: 當蟑螂被肉食性動物威脅時，會發出更大的聲響。

sentences.english: I have been a hard-core meat eater all my life.
sentences.chinese: 我這輩子一直是鐵桿肉食者。

sentences.english: The meat-eater's desire for meat drives another to kill and provide that meat.
sentences.chinese: 食肉的慾望導致了他人的殺生以提供肉食。

sentences.english: And a daily vitamin D supplement is a good idea for vegans and meat-eaters alike.
sentences.chinese: 每天補充維生素D對於素食者和肉食者都是很好的。

sentences.english: Consider this: your body typically takes three days to digest meat.
sentences.chinese: 你要知道，你的身體一般需要三天來消化肉食。

sentences.english: Vegetarians believe that eating meat is bad karma .
sentences.chinese: 素食者認爲喫肉食是造惡業。

sentences.english: Most predators ' eyes are in the front of their head.
sentences.chinese: 大部分肉食動物的眼睛都長在頭的前方。

sentences.english: Flesh-eaters' and vegetarians' views differ from each other sharply.
sentences.chinese: 肉食者和素食者的觀點截然不同。

sentences.english: Do carnivores have any original sins since they eat meat?
sentences.chinese: 肉食性動物有原罪嗎，既然它們喫肉？

definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
non-vegetarian dish (including meat, fish, garlic, onion etc)
